databases.name: NebulaDB
databases.description: Inspired by the vast and mysterious nature of space, NebulaDB is designed to handle enormous datasets with ease and elegance.

databases.name: QuantumStore
databases.description: A futuristic database server that promises lightning-fast queries and storage capabilities, pushing the boundaries of data management.

databases.name: AuroraVault
databases.description: Named after the Aurora Borealis, this database server offers stunning performance and data security, illuminating the path to efficient data storage.

databases.name: TitanDB
databases.description: A robust and powerful database server that stands as a giant in the field, capable of managing the most demanding workloads.

databases.name: ZenithSQL
databases.description: Reaching the peak of performance and reliability, ZenithSQL provides a high-level SQL database experience with unparalleled stability.
